thread.title: Cramer's lightning round: I've got too many headaches to invest in a REIT

title: Cramer's lightning round: I've got too many headaches to invest in a REIT
text:
Welltower : "Real estate investment trust. We do not need that right now. I've got enough headaches."
Control4 Corp : "Too competitive an area. We're going to have to say ix-nay on that one."
Sunrun Inc. : "It's been a good solar stock, which is actually quite surprising. My problem is that this stock has run a little too much."
Watch the full lightning round here: show chapters Cramer's lightning round: I've got too many headaches to invest in a REIT 17 Hours Ago | 02:42
